meanings.definition: The state or quality of being incomparable.
meanings.sent1: Her incomparabilities in art made her stand out from the rest of the students.
meanings.sent2: The incomparabilities of the two paintings made it hard to choose a favorite.
meanings.sent3: The cat's incomparabilities in catching mice always amazed the family.
meanings.sent4: The incomparabilities of the sunrise over the ocean took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The incomparabilities of her kindness touched everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: The inability to be compared or likened to anything else.
meanings.sent1: The incomparabilities of the unique gem left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: His incomparabilities in the field of mathematics were well-known.
meanings.sent3: The cake's incomparabilities in taste made it disappear within minutes.
meanings.sent4: The incomparabilities of her singing voice echoed through the hall.
meanings.sent5: The mountain's incomparabilities in size made it a sight to behold.
